#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

[http://emotiv.com Emotiv EPOC] is a relatively cheap EEG device that comes with Software Development KIT in several programming languages. Adastra utilize it through a C# wrapper provided by Emotiv. 

Please, note that in order to be able to use the raw EEG signal from Emotiv, you need to buy Emotiv Research SDK. This is the edition required by Adastra. Developer edition is not enough.

Two options are available:

  * since version 0.12 OpenVibe supports Emotiv without pre-compilation. If you are using older version or would like to learn more then follow this [http://openvibe.inria.fr/documentation/0.8.0/Doc_FAQ.html#Doc_FAQ_Emotiv link].

  * enable Emtoiv native support in Adastra by putting edk.dll and edk_utils.dll in Adastra's bin folder (usually where Adastra.exe is extracted). Both dlls should be in "\Program Files\Emotiv Research Edition SDK_v1.0.0.4-PREMIUM" depending on your installation.

Adastra supports [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows_Presentation_Foundation WPF] signal charting for Emotiv EPOC.
